description: Add, update and remove load balancer rules.

domain.description: Domain the rule is related to.

protocol.description: The protocol to be used on the load balancer

description.description: The description of the load balancer rule.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

public_port.description: The public port from where the network traffic will be load balanced from.

account.description: Account the rule is related to.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the load balancer IP address is related to.

private_port.description: The private port of the private ip address/virtual machine where the network traffic will be load balanced to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

open_firewall.description: Whether the firewall rule for public port should be created, while creating the new rule.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

cidr.description: CIDR (full notation) to be used for firewall rule if required.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the rule should be created.

ip_address.description: Public IP address from where the network traffic will be load balanced from.

name.description: The name of the load balancer rule.
